about_the_game:
Gems and Minerals Book

This Gems and Minerals-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Shiny gems, fascinating minerals and useful ores!

Delve into the ground to see what wonders await.

Contents

The Gems and Minerals book unlocks the following images:
  • Garnet - 27x29
  • Emerald Ring - 47x37
  • Diamond - 51x35
  • Gem Encrusted Staff - 60x133
  • Rhodochrosite Gemstone - 62x87
  • Golem - 63x88
  • Mineshaft - 75x75
  • Spessartine Ore - 78x85
  • Gem Serpent - 85x139
  • Aquamarine Gemstone - 95x96
  • Purple Fluorite - 102x77
  • Geode - 108x141
  • Gemstones - 118x33
  • Resource Rich - 120x120
  • Larimar - 123x62
  • Crystal Skill - 125x148
  • Mining - 126x88
  • Bismuth - 195x271
  • Starfall - 232x150
  • Fossilized - 336x252

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
